title: Crypto Ls, End Of The Potter-verse? 4.15.22
itunes:title: Crypto Ls, End Of The Potter-verse? 4.15.22
description:
In episode 1227, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian, writer and host of You Can Tell Me Anything, Teresa Lee to discuss… Let’s check in with some crypto Ls, The ‘Fantastic Beasts’ Series is Hollywood’s Biggest Dumpster Fire and more!

  1. Trumpworld Crypto Coin Sinks After Trump Gets Involved
  2. $2.8 Million Jack Dorsey Tweet NFT Turned Out to Be a Terrible Investment
  3. The ‘Fantastic Beasts’ Series is Hollywood’s Biggest Dumpster Fire

  4. Is Katherine Waterston Absent From the Fantastic Beasts Poster & Trailer for Being Pro-Trans?

  5. How Much Screen Time Does Katherine Waterston Get In 'Fantastic Beasts 3'?
  6. ‘Fantastic Beasts’: How Scandal and Controversy Have Derailed the Wizarding Franchise
  7. Warner Bros Responds To J.K. Rowling Comments, Resolves To “Confront Difficult Societal Issues”
  8. With ‘Harry Potter’ reunion, HBO finds itself between J.K. Rowling and a hard place
  9. 'Fantastic Beasts 3' has lowest opening weekend of any Wizarding World film

Teresa's Tour Dates: teresaleecomedy.com/shows

LISTEN: Slow Bones (Cool Cats Mix) by Tony Allen & Hugh Masekela

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
